root: ^Lima: I c-can't pick it up... what if I ruin it? There's only o-one flower...
^Look at Mars (Maybe she can pick it up)
^Pick it yourself. There's no time to lose!
^Encourage Lima to do it herself. She needs to get more confident!

a: ^Mars: What? Is there something in my face?
^Mars cast a spell and a magic box appears.
b: ^You step ahead, it's your time to shine. There's no way you're going to sit there and wait for something to happen. Terry has to be close and it could get away soon!
^You reach the flower and hand it to Lima.
c: ^You look at Lima. You're eyes say "You can do this" and she seems to read them perfectly.
^She looks unsecure but starts lifting her arm towards the flower.
^You give her a gentle push and she finally grabs it.
cont: ^Lima: I... I g-got it! At last!
^She then takes out some notes and starts brewing the fertilizer.
^Mars: Wow, that looks really well done.
^Lima: I'm n-not so sure about that... (what if it doesn't work?)
^Lima pours the fertilizer in the pot.
^Mars: [To Soul] Ps! You know that it won't work unless you dance around it?
^2. Sounds legit. You start dancing around the plant

a2: ^She smiles in a funny way and looks at the plant.
b2: ^Mars: Hehehehe... You are funny. (but why does he do everything I say?)
^You keep dancing and look at the plant.

cont2: ^Lima: I k-knew it, this is a disaster!
^It looked like the fertilizer didn't work but right before she could finish the last sentence, the plant started to shine.
^Lima: Oh, for the mother of all creatures, what a relief!
^You feel the floor trembling, is it a secondary effect of the fertilizer? an earthquake maybe?
^Lima jumps scared letting go of the plant.
^Mars manages to grab the pot right before it crashes on the floor.
^It's Tibo, the owner of the plant Lima was taking care of. He runs and takes the it from Mars' hands.
^Tibo: How dare you letting it fall! You silly mummy!
^Tibo: You always so sloppy and nervous! You should be more confident and stop behaving like that!
^1. Step between them and confront the monster

a3: ^Tibo: Woah?! And who’s this little one?
^Mars: I think our friend here doesn’t like your attitude…
^Lima looks at you sharing a thank you stare.
b3: ^Mars: H-hey! (Do I look like your mom or something?)
^Tibo is still angry at Lima and Mars steps in as you look scared.
^Mars: Hey Tib! Lima said she’s sorry, let it go!
^Tibo: Yeah, it’s fine. Luminchi looks alright anyway.
c3: ^Tibo keeps yelling for a while until he calms down and starts talking to his plant.

cont3: ^Tibo: How have you been Luminchi? Did the mummy take good care of you?
^Tibo seemed really happy with his plant until he noticed something.
^Tibo: Something feels off… Have you done anything weird to my poor Luminchi?
^Lima looked really nervous and was about to have a panic attack. “What am I supposed to tell him” she thought.
^1. Gently push Lima, she should always tell the truth!
^2. Shake your head! If Tibo finds out he will be really mad.

a4: ^Lima calms down taking a deep breath, looks at you and finally explains everything to Tibo.
^He looked angry at first but then he looked at the plant and got quiet for a moment.
b4: ^Tibo is quickly losing he’s temper and right before he exploded, Lima exclaimed the first lie she could though of.
^Lima: O-of course it looks d-different! I t-talked to it all day and used lot’s of c-cool treats for plats! It must be v-very happy!
^Tibo didn't look too convinced by Lima’s words.
^He was about to give up when a weird smell caught his attention.
^Tibo: This… this is the smell of an anemone curasavica! That can only mean one thing!
^Tibo was about to start another fight but suddenly stopped.
^Tibo: … (I could use some more of that fertilizer on one of my plants. My poor baby, she’s almost done for... but that could save her life!).
c4: ^Tibo: Where did you get the flower?
^Lima: I-it was down that h-hill but… it w-was the only one left.
^Tibo: But there are other places where it can be found, right?
^Lima: In an o-old abandoned mirror warehouse… at the city.
^Lima: W-what?! N-no way! There are lot’s of humans on the way there!
^Mars: Don’t worry, it’s Halloween, they won’t notice us!
^Mars: I’m running out of ideas… and that is the only place where I didn’t look.
